title: Clarence Thomas Released From Hospital, Supreme Court Says
sub_head: Justice had been admitted a week earlier after experiencing flu-like symptoms
body:
WASHINGTON—Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas has been released from the hospital, the court said Friday, having been admitted a week earlier after experiencing flu-like symptoms.
Justice Thomas, 73 years old, is a 1991 appointee of President George H.W. Bush and the longest-serving member of the current court. He was treated at Washington’s Sibley Memorial Hospital.
